verses.verse: Now the serpent <S%H5175><s%> was more <S%H4480><s%> crafty <S%H6175><s%> than <S%H4480><s%> any <S%H3605><s%> beast <S%H9130><s%> of the field <S%H7704><s%> which <S%H834><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> God <S%H430><s%> had made. <S%H6213><s%> And he said <S%H559><s%> to the woman, <S%H802><s%> "Indeed, <S%H637><s%> <S%H3588><s%> has God <S%H430><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> 'You shall not eat <S%H398><s%> from any <S%H3605><s%> tree <S%H6086><s%> of the garden <S%H1588><s%>'?"
And the woman <S%H802><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to the serpent, <S%H5175><s%> "From the fruit <S%H6529><s%> of the trees <S%H6086><s%> of the garden <S%H1588><s%> we may eat; <S%H398><s%>

but from the fruit <S%H6529><s%> of the tree <S%H6086><s%> which <S%H834><s%> is in the middle <S%H8432><s%> of the garden, <S%H1588><s%> God <S%H430><s%> has said, <S%H559><s%> 'You shall not eat <S%H398><s%> from it or touch <S%H5060><s%> it, lest <S%H6435><s%> you die. <S%H4191><s%>' "
And the serpent <S%H5175><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to the woman, <S%H802><s%> "You surely <S%H4191><s%> shall not die! <S%H4191><s%>

"For God <S%H430><s%> knows <S%H3045><s%> that in the day <S%H3117><s%> you eat <S%H398><s%> from it your eyes <S%H5869><s%> will be opened, <S%H6491><s%> and you will be like God, <S%H430><s%> knowing <S%H3045><s%> good <S%H9185><s%> and evil. <S%H9563><s%>"

When the woman <S%H802><s%> saw <S%H7200><s%> that the tree <S%H6086><s%> was good <S%H2896><s%> for food, <S%H3978><s%> and that it was a delight <S%H8378><s%> to the eyes, <S%H5869><s%> and that the tree <S%H6086><s%> was desirable <S%H2530><s%> to make [one] wise, <S%H7919><s%> she took <S%H3947><s%> from its fruit <S%H6529><s%> and ate; <S%H398><s%> and she gave <S%H5414><s%> also <S%H1571><s%> to her husband <S%H376><s%> with her, and he ate. <S%H398><s%>

Then the eyes <S%H5869><s%> of both <S%H8147><s%> of them were opened, <S%H6491><s%> and they knew <S%H3045><s%> that they were naked; <S%H5903><s%> and they sewed <S%H8609><s%> fig <S%H8384><s%> leaves <S%H5929><s%> together <S%H8609><s%> and made <S%H6213><s%> themselves <S%H1992><s%> loin <S%H9118><s%> coverings. <S%H9118><s%>

And they heard <S%H8085><s%> the sound <S%H6963><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> God <S%H430><s%> walking <S%H1980><s%> in the garden <S%H1588><s%> in the cool <S%H7307><s%> of the day, <S%H3117><s%> and the man <S%H120><s%> and his wife <S%H802><s%> hid <S%H2244><s%> themselves from the presence <S%H6440><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> God <S%H430><s%> among <S%H8432><s%> the trees <S%H6086><s%> of the garden. <S%H1588><s%>
Then the Lord <S%H3068><s%> God <S%H430><s%> called <S%H7121><s%> to the man, <S%H120><s%> and said <S%H559><s%> to him, "Where <S%H335><s%> are you?"

And he said, <S%H559><s%> "I heard <S%H8085><s%> the sound <S%H6963><s%> of Thee in the garden, <S%H1588><s%> and I was afraid <S%H3372><s%> because <S%H3588><s%> I was naked; <S%H5903><s%> so I hid <S%H2244><s%> myself."

And He said, <S%H559><s%> "Who <S%H4310><s%> told <S%H5046><s%> you that you were naked <S%H5903><s%>? Have you eaten <S%H398><s%> from the tree <S%H6086><s%> of which <S%H834><s%> I commanded <S%H6680><s%> you not to eat <S%H398><s%>?"

And the man <S%H120><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> "The woman <S%H802><s%> whom <S%H834><s%> Thou gavest <S%H5414><s%> [to be] with me, she gave <S%H5414><s%> me from the tree, <S%H6086><s%> and I ate. <S%H398><s%>"

Then the Lord <S%H3068><s%> God <S%H430><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to the woman, <S%H802><s%> "What <S%H4100><s%> is this <S%H2088><s%> you have done <S%H6213><s%>?" And the woman <S%H802><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> "The serpent <S%H5175><s%> deceived <S%H5378><s%> me, and I ate. <S%H398><s%>"

And the Lord <S%H3068><s%> God <S%H430><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to the serpent, <S%H5175><s%> "Because <S%H3588><s%> you have done <S%H6213><s%> this, <S%H2088><s%> Cursed <S%H779><s%> are you more <S%H4480><s%> than <S%H4480><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> cattle, <S%H929><s%> And more <S%H4480><s%> than <S%H4480><s%> every <S%H3605><s%> beast <S%H9130><s%> of the field; <S%H7704><s%> On your belly <S%H1512><s%> shall you go, <S%H1980><s%> And dust <S%H6083><s%> shall you eat <S%H398><s%> All <S%H3605><s%> the days <S%H3117><s%> of your life; <S%H9132><s%>

And I will put <S%H7896><s%> enmity <S%H342><s%> Between <S%H996><s%> you and the woman, <S%H802><s%> And between <S%H996><s%> your seed <S%H2233><s%> and her seed; <S%H2233><s%> He shall bruise <S%H7779><s%> you on the head, <S%H7218><s%> And you shall bruise <S%H7779><s%> him on the heel. <S%H6119><s%>"

To the woman <S%H802><s%> He said, <S%H559><s%> "I will greatly <S%H7235><s%> multiply <S%H7235><s%> Your pain <S%H6093><s%> in childbirth, <S%H2032><s%> In pain <S%H6089><s%> you shall bring <S%H3205><s%> forth <S%H3205><s%> children; <S%H1121><s%> Yet your desire <S%H8669><s%> shall be for your husband, <S%H376><s%> And he shall rule <S%H4910><s%> over you."

Then to Adam <S%H121><s%> He said, <S%H559><s%> "Because <S%H3588><s%> you have listened <S%H8085><s%> to the voice <S%H6963><s%> of your wife, <S%H802><s%> and have eaten <S%H398><s%> from the tree <S%H6086><s%> about which <S%H834><s%> I commanded <S%H6680><s%> you, saying, <S%H559><s%> 'You shall not eat <S%H398><s%> from it'; Cursed <S%H779><s%> is the ground <S%H127><s%> because <S%H5668><s%> of you; In toil <S%H6093><s%> you shall eat <S%H398><s%> of it All <S%H3605><s%> the days <S%H3117><s%> of your life. <S%H9132><s%>
"Both thorns <S%H6975><s%> and thistles <S%H1863><s%> it shall grow <S%H6779><s%> for you; And you shall eat <S%H398><s%> the plants <S%H6212><s%> of the field; <S%H7704><s%>

By the sweat <S%H2188><s%> of your face <S%H639><s%> You shall eat <S%H398><s%> bread, <S%H3899><s%> Till <S%H5704><s%> you return <S%H7725><s%> to the ground, <S%H127><s%> Because <S%H3588><s%> from it you were taken; <S%H3947><s%> For you are dust, <S%H6083><s%> And to dust <S%H6083><s%> you shall return. <S%H7725><s%>"
Now the man <S%H120><s%> called <S%H7121><s%> his wife's name <S%H8034><s%> Eve, <S%H2332><s%> because <S%H3588><s%> she was the mother <S%H517><s%> of all <S%H3605><s%> [the] living. <S%H2416><s%>
And the Lord <S%H3068><s%> God <S%H430><s%> made <S%H6213><s%> garments <S%H3801><s%> of skin <S%H5785><s%> for Adam <S%H121><s%> and his wife, <S%H802><s%> and clothed <S%H3847><s%> them.

Then the Lord <S%H3068><s%> God <S%H430><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> "Behold, <S%H2005><s%> the man <S%H120><s%> has become <S%H1961><s%> like one <S%H259><s%> of Us, knowing <S%H3045><s%> good <S%H9185><s%> and evil; <S%H9563><s%> and now, <S%H6258><s%> lest <S%H6435><s%> he stretch <S%H7971><s%> out his hand, <S%H3027><s%> and take <S%H3947><s%> also <S%H1571><s%> from the tree <S%H6086><s%> of life, <S%H9132><s%> and eat, <S%H398><s%> and live <S%H2421><s%> forever <S%H5769><s%>" â€“

therefore the Lord <S%H3068><s%> God <S%H430><s%> sent <S%H7971><s%> him out from the garden <S%H1588><s%> of Eden, <S%H5731><s%> to cultivate <S%H5647><s%> the ground <S%H127><s%> from which <S%H834><s%> he was taken. <S%H3947><s%>

So He drove <S%H1644><s%> the man <S%H120><s%> out; and at the east <S%H6924><s%> of the garden <S%H1588><s%> of Eden <S%H5731><s%> He stationed <S%H7931><s%> the cherubim, <S%H3742><s%> and the flaming <S%H3858><s%> sword <S%H2719><s%> which turned <S%H2015><s%> every direction, to guard <S%H8104><s%> the way <S%H1870><s%> to the tree <S%H6086><s%> of life. <S%H9132><s%>
